improvement_list.improvement_desc: Division by zero error.  The variable 'x' will be 0 after the loop, leading to a runtime error when calculating 1/x. Add a check to ensure x is not zero before the division.
The variable y is repeatedly set to 0 in the loop.  This is redundant and could be optimized by only setting y to 0 outside the loop if needed.

Unreachable code: The loop will always execute, setting x to 0. The condition 'x > 0' within the 'if' statement will always be false after the loop completes. Thus, the code inside the 'if' statement is unreachable.
